page.title: 06HOUSING
page.content: There is a great mix of housing in Ashwell, showing how the village has developed.Victorian terraced cottages and earlier half-timbered buildings are now mixed in with modern houses and flats. Most are{owner-occupied. Our survey showed that there were 122 detached; 162 semi; 199 terraced and about 20 half-timbered houses in Ashwell. Newnham is dominated by two large farmhouses. Some small cottages are built around the green. There are 12 detached; 6 semi; 11 terraced and 4 half-timbered houses in Newnham. Houses in Ashwell are{expensive. Family houses are between Â£70,000 and Â£80,000, which is well above average. There is little{local authority {housing}in the block. The council builds for the old and young marrieds who can't afford to buy.
